rule.name: AB_CreateNewCmpntCdtForUpdatedParentList
rule.description: rule to create a new cmpnt cdt for updated parent list
rule.definition: { Pk_Id : ri!cdtFrmCmpnts.Pk_Id, Id : ri!cdtFrmCmpnts.Id, FrmVersionId: ri!cdtFrmCmpnts.FrmVersionId, name: ri!cdtFrmCmpnts.name, label: ri!cdtFrmCmpnts.label, description: ri!cdtFrmCmpnts.description, instruction: ri!cdtFrmCmpnts.instruction, parentCondition: ri!cdtFrmCmpnts.parentCondition, responseType: ri!cdtFrmCmpnts.responseType, defaultValue: ri!cdtFrmCmpnts.defaultValue, labelPositon: ri!cdtFrmCmpnts.labelPositon, /*buttonValue: ri!cdtFrmCmpnts.buttonValue,*/ placeholderLabel:ri!cdtFrmCmpnts.placeholderLabel, isRequired: ri!cdtFrmCmpnts.isRequired, isReadOnly: ri!cdtFrmCmpnts.isReadOnly, /*isInActive: ri!cdtFrmCmpnts.isInActive,*/ isDisabled:ri!cdtFrmCmpnts.isDisabled, isValueResetFlag: ri!cdtFrmCmpnts.isValueResetFlag , columnIndex: ri!cdtFrmCmpnts.columnIndex, seqIndex: ri!cdtFrmCmpnts.seqIndex , sectionComponentId: ri!cdtFrmCmpnts.sectionComponentId , gridComponentId: ri!cdtFrmCmpnts.gridComponentId, optionList: ri!cdtFrmCmpnts.optionList, valueList: ri!cdtFrmCmpnts.valueList, parentList: ri!updatedParentList }
